name: Ever Winter Nights
description:
Controls:

WASD / arrow keysMoveZ, SpaceInteract, jump (on platformer scenes)X, CTRLAttack
ENTEROpen the Missions menu

This demo is still in development so there might be some bugs lurking around in the game...BUT!

You can pet the cat.

 

Please feel free to give feedback on the things that need to be fixed or added to the game! I'll tackle those as soon as I can ✨

Happy exploring!
